General.Name: DongGuan Winnerway Industrial Zone Ltd
General.Description: DongGuan Winnerway Industry Zone LTD. engages in the real estate development business in China. The company engages in the development and operation of residential and industrial areas, as well as leasing factories and other real estate projects. It is also involved in the coal mining business; industrial zone development and plant leasing activities; recycling and utilization of environmental protection and renewable resources; and the provision of construction and installation of hydropower projects. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
